process.name: Blue Prism Analytics - Dashboard
process.narrative: Actions and activities on Dashboard section of Analytics tab.

input.name: New Password
input.narrative: If this is your first login it will prompt you to change the password.

input.name: Tab Name
input.narrative: Name of Tab to Click

input.name: pid
input.narrative: PID to attach to

input.name: pid
input.narrative: PID to attach to

input.name: Menu Option
input.narrative: Option from Dashboard's Right Click Menu. Case Sensitive.

input.name: Dashboard Item
input.narrative: Item Name to right click on. Default: Default dashboard.

input.name: Tile Name
input.narrative: Time Name to Include in Dashboard. Separate multiple tiles with semicolon.

resource.action: Edit Dashboard - Drag Tile Into Edit-Mode Dashboard

input.name: Dashboard Name
input.narrative: Name to set on the dashboard.

decision.expression: [Dashboard Name] = [Captured Dashboard Name] AND [Captured Dashboard Name] <> ""

exception.detail: "Blue Prism was unable to set the dashboard name."

input.name: Pane Mernu Option
input.narrative: Edit, Save, Refresh, or Close

resource.action: Edit Dashboard - Click Pane Menu Option

output.name: Edit Mode?
output.narrative: True if dashboard is in Edit mode, False otherwise.

resource.action: Edit Dashboard - Dashboard in Edit Mode?

exception.detail: "Blue Prism is unable to save the dashboard."

input.name: Menu Option
input.narrative: Option from Dashboard's Right Click Menu. Case Sensitive.

input.name: Dashboard Item
input.narrative: Item Name to right click on. Default: Default dashboard.

input.name: Dashboard Name
input.narrative: Name to set on the dashboard.

input.name: Pane Mernu Option
input.narrative: Edit, Save, Refresh, or Close

resource.action: Edit Dashboard - Click Pane Menu Option

input.name: Menu Option
input.narrative: Option from Dashboard's Right Click Menu. Case Sensitive.

input.name: Dashboard Item
input.narrative: Item Name to right click on. Default: Default dashboard.

input.name: Dashboard Name
input.narrative: Name to set on the dashboard.

input.name: Pane Mernu Option
input.narrative: Edit, Save, Refresh, or Close

resource.action: Edit Dashboard - Click Pane Menu Option

input.name: Menu Option
input.narrative: Option from Dashboard's Right Click Menu. Case Sensitive.

input.name: Dashboard Item
input.narrative: Item Name to right click on. Default: Default dashboard.

input.name: Tree Name
input.narrative: Name of the tree to be extended.

input.name: Item Name
input.narrative: Name of the item to be clicked on.

input.name: Audit Date
input.narrative: Date for the Audit to View

output.name: Audit Log Table
output.narrative: Contents of the Audit Log Viewer

resource.action: Get View Log Content for Audit Log

decision.expression: InStr([Audit Log Table.Narrative], "set the dashboard '" & [Dashboard Name] & "' as their home page") > 0 AND ToDateTime([Current Time]) <= ToDateTime([Audit Log Table.Time (Local)])

exception.detail: "Record suggesting the Home Dashboard has changed is not found in Audit Logs."

input.name: Collection
input.narrative: The collection to be reversed.

input.name: Tab Name
input.narrative: Name of Tab to Click

input.name: Dashboard Name
input.narrative: Dashboard Name to Delete

input.name: Popup message expected
input.expr: "If you delete or rename a published dashboard that is specified in the data gateways configuration, the change must be reflected in the configuration."

input.name: Dashboard Name
input.narrative: Dashboard Name to Delete

input.name: Tab Name
input.narrative: Name of Tab to Click

stage.name: Note3
stage.narrative: Enabled Send Dashboards to Data Gateways

input.name: Tab Name
input.narrative: Name of Tab to Click

input.name: Tree Name
input.narrative: Name of the tree to be extended.

input.name: Item Name
input.narrative: Name of the item to be clicked on.

input.name: Sub Item Name
input.narrative: Name of the sub item to be clicked on.

input.name: Select Item Method?
input.narrative: True by Default. Selects the node from system tab using Select Item approach. If the node is not available (Greyed out) an exception will be thrown. Use this method if you are certain the node is available for selection.

input.name: Retry MouseClick?
input.narrative: Default to True. Retries Global Mouse Click up to 3 times.

input.name: Clean Up?
input.narrative: False by Default. Set True if clean up is required at the beginning of the Action.

stage.name: Set Send dashboards to Data Gateways

input.name: State
input.narrative: The state that you want to set the checkbox. True or False.

input.name: Expect Error
input.narrative: True or False, do you expect an error when you press apply.

input.name: Dashboard Name
input.narrative: Name to set on the dashboard.

input.name: Pane Mernu Option
input.narrative: Edit, Save, Refresh, or Close

input.name: Expect Popup
input.narrative: False as default.

input.name: Expected Popup Message
input.narrative: The error you expect to see.

resource.action: Edit Dashboard - Click Pane Menu Option

input.name: Menu Option
input.narrative: Option from Dashboard's Right Click Menu. Case Sensitive.

input.name: Dashboard Item
input.narrative: Item Name to right click on. Default: Default dashboard.

input.name: Tab Name
input.narrative: Name of Tab to Click

input.name: Connection Method
input.narrative: 'Integrated Security' or 'SQL Authentication User'

resource.action: Data Gateways Settings - Set Database Connection Method

input.name: Tab Name
input.narrative: Name of Tab to Click

input.name: Tree Name
input.narrative: Name of the tree to be extended.

input.name: Item Name
input.narrative: Name of the item to be clicked on.

input.name: Sub Item Name
input.narrative: Name of the sub item to be clicked on.

input.name: Select Item Method?
input.narrative: True by Default. Selects the node from system tab using Select Item approach. If the node is not available (Greyed out) an exception will be thrown. Use this method if you are certain the node is available for selection.

input.name: Retry MouseClick?
input.narrative: Default to True. Retries Global Mouse Click up to 3 times.

input.name: Clean Up?
input.narrative: False by Default. Set True if clean up is required at the beginning of the Action.

input.name: Scheme Name
input.narrative: The name in which you want to call your encrpytion scheme.

input.name: Available?
input.narrative: This will tick a box that allows the encryption scheme to become available.

input.name: Database?
input.narrative: Mark as true if you want to store the scheme on the database. Please note that this will default to true.

input.name: Method
input.narrative: The encryption method used with the scheme.

input.name: Scheme Name
input.narrative: The name of the scheme you wish to select.

resource.action: Encryption Schemes - Select Encryption Scheme for Credentials
